TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> property to determine which cell changed. Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which cell state changed.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
